briefTitle: A Study to Evaluate SAGE-217 in Adult Participants With Major Depressive Disorder (MDD)
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Open-Label, 1-Year Study of the Safety, Tolerability, and Need for Re-Treatment With SAGE-217 in Adult Subjects With Major Depressive Disorder
summary: This is a Phase 3, open-label, 1-year study of the safety, tolerability, and need for re-treatment with SAGE-217 in adult participants with MDD.

primaryOutcome.measure: Part A: Number of Participants With Treatment Emergent Adverse Events (TEAEs)
